tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (CC And) (PP (IN in) (NP (JJ other) (NN news))) (, ,) (NP (DT the) (NNP Pope)) (VP (VBZ has) (VP (VBN announced) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBZ is) (RB not) (NP (DT a) (JJ Muslim))))))) (. .)))
